snippet.textDisplay:
Interesting stuff and a good explanation of what the sars cov 2 virus is? 
Do you mind me using the cv19 portion of this video, in one of my own?
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay:
Thank you @_Oxytropis_, but I'd rather get Professor Dave's permission, before using it? 
Fair use, or not, experience has taught me that YouTube will still copyright strike you irrespective of fair use. But it makes life easier, if you've already got their permission to get the strike removed and besides, it's just polite to ask? Lol
It's a shame he said no, as I would've credited him in the video and it's description, but I'll just have to use someone else's explanation instead?
Thanks anyway for trying 😁

snippet.textDisplay: @Sam Fisher I give you permission to use any and or all of Professor Dave Explains videos, as long as you adhere to fair use 😉
